title: Like DRS, I Like My DnB with a Little Soul
message:
Shout out to all my **liquid heads**.

Welcome!

This is an playful experiment exploring an idea I have started calling imprints of experience. This idea can be traced to a short story I wrote a while back - [Experiences in Memory Space](https://futurewip.com/experiences-in-memory-space). My first ever piece of fiction.

In this story, Helen buys a Dub Pistols record and imprints it with a memory space before gifting it to her pal. Everyone reading these words should now be posession of a similarly imprinted record. One of two bad boy liquid DnB records out of a collection of four (see below).

 The first ever imprints of experience.

A gift from Snip & the Tune Catcher!

Enjoy the tunes, be sure to check back here now and again to see if and how this space evolves. Hopefully one day it will become a shared memory space, we can all help curate and evolve. But who knows. For now it is just a bit of fun! 

**Much love x**

 P.S sorry Sen not got the playlist for this one on YouTube yet.

collection.title: Something Heavy - Calibre & Markus Intalex feat. Fox
